name: Super Smash Bros. Infinite
overview: In the universe this homebrew game is set in, this might be the database entry you would see: Super Smash Bros. Infinite is a 2024 fighting game developed by Sora Ltd. & Bandai Namco and published by Nintendo. It was released on December 17, 2024 for Nintendo HDS and Nintendo Matrix. It is the sixth instalment in the Super Smash Bros. series and a sequel to Super Smash Bros., Super Smash Bros. Melee, Super Smash Bros. Brawl, Super Smash Bros. For Nintendo 3DS & Wii U, and Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.
